title: League Keeps Crashing
body:
Okay so I have played league actively for a few years now, no issues. But, now all the sudden every time I load into a game the second I load in my whole computer freezes and starts making a buzzing noise from the speakers. I can't control ult delete, tab out, or anything I have to force shut off my laptop. So, I have scanned my laptop for viruses(none), checked all my hardware(no issues), run stress tests and everything I can think of. This only happens to my laptop when I load into a game with league. Nothing else I do on my laptop causes this issue. I was wondering if anyone else has ran into this before? I am at a loss of what to do.
My league name is sadie bear. Incase riot sees this and wants to take me out of low priority que, because it's not my fault I was placed into it :(.

Any insight or suggestions would be so appreciated. Than you.

replies.body:
Hello, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this

PS: LeaverBuster can never be removed, no matter the context.
Leaver buster hardcore! I got the problem fixed, thank you for helping!

The freezing and buzzing issue may be due to a recent Windows 10 update.  It auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing these crashes for some players.  Disabling that should get everything fixed up!
That worked, thank you so much!
